design_request: Minimalist triplex 2BHK townhouse with total area of 2500 sqft, open-plan kitchen and living area, library, swimming pool, in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: foyer area with reception and sitting space
open-plan living room adjoining the kitchen, designed for spacious minimalist feel
modern, open-plan kitchen with integrated appliances and minimalistic cabinetry
quiet reading area with built-in shelves and ample natural light
spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom
comfy second bedroom suitable for family or guest usage
multipurpose room that can be used as a home office or gym
